asserts.localErrorMessage: [Notify party] is prohibited if there is at least one [Goods item] without an [Additional information coded] equal to '10600'
asserts.errorMessage: If 'Special Mention Additional Information_id' does not equal '10600' for at least one 'Goods item' then the data group 'Trader notify party' can not be used (C583)
The field 'Name' within Import Operation Notify Party is required if no 'TIN' has been declared (C501)

asserts.localErrorMessage: [Street and number] should be present if not ( [TIN] )
asserts.errorMessage: The field 'Street and Number' within Import Operation.Notify Party is required if no TIN has been declared (C501)

asserts.localErrorMessage: [Postal code] should be present if not ( [TIN] )
asserts.errorMessage: The field 'Postcode' within Import Operation.Notify Party is required if no TIN has been declared (C501)
The field 'City' within Import Operation.Notify Party is required if no TIN has been declared (C501)

asserts.localErrorMessage: [Country code] should be present if not ( [TIN] )
asserts.errorMessage: The field 'Country Code' within Import Operation.Notify Party is required if no TIN has been declared (C501)
